about_the_game:
Game Description:

  • Skulker is an intergalactic-themed casual fishing game that combines elements of fishing exploration and prop collection.

  • As a player, you will play a Star Hunter "skulker" who doesn't want to work but wants to fish. You will enjoy fishing time on different civilized planets, meet all kinds of alien civilization characters, and understand their world and stories.

  • In the game, players can match 160 different kinds of fishing equipment, combining different genres of equipment matching effects in different planets, in order to facilitate the decision-making of the current need to explore the attributes, and ultimately smooth collection of the rich catches of various planets, and complete the commission requests sent to you by different characters

Game Features:

  • Multiple planets with very different styles to experience different interstellar civilizations.

  • A large number of plot texts and dialogue choices enrich the unique world outlook settings of each planet, allowing players to experience different local customs.

  • 33 different fishing games to show your fishing skills.

  • 1700+ rich collection elements meet the player's pure collection desire and make time pass quickly unconsciously.

  • There are also a variety of mini-games with fun apps to pass the extra time.

  • Finally, you can also display all the fish you catch on your computer desktop to view as a screensaver fish tank.

Final:

  • If you're looking for a time-killing game to go to work and fish, Skulker will be your best choice.

  • If you are keen on fishing endlessly in all kinds of games, Skulker will meet your needs directly.

  • If you're addicted to collecting, Skulker will also stop you in your tracks.

  • If you've read this far, you can go ahead and add Skulker to your Wishlist now.

  • It's the greatest support and recognition, thank you!
detailed_description:
Welcome to the community

More content is being worked on, so feel free to join our player community to provide some more suggestions!

Discord


About the Game

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: 2,6 GHz Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Skulker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Skulker is a casual fishing game for work slackers. Swing your pole and enjoy your leisure fishing time.
